item.title: Mopman And Frank_'s Adventures
item.dc:creator: @Unlocked Unlocked
item.description:
@Unlocked wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:40, topic:258048”][quote author=Attiusca link=topic=340684.msg2640277#msg2640277 date=1232815053]
The only reason I sign my name at the bottom of every post is because kids like you throw some stupid tantrum over the internet.

-Attiusca
[/quote]

Sorry what? That had nothing to do with the thread. Trying to provoke further response is just trolling, so I’d say you were the tantrum filled little bitch trying to get your own way.

And just put “-Attiusca” in your signature, or do you think you’re cool because you have to put more effort in than everyone else per post? IMO that’s pretty retarded but hey, if you think it makes you an internet hardman being able to call people kids go ahead and carry on being the moron you are. Perhaps you just don’t know how to open up the User CP.[/quote]

I want to be an internet hardman. Teach me, please?

Read full topic

And by the way, cut your greasy unkempt hair you hippy.

then why don’t you post your picture fat ass and why the fuck do you even put in your signature?? it’s almost as gay as you. fucking faggot
